## Biography
Mustapha is a Master’s in Artificial Intelligence student at the Queen Mary University of London. He is a recipient of the Google DeepMind Scholarship and the joint QuantumBlack (a McKinsey Company) and Office of AI scholarship. He is a student intern at the Large Scale and Data Systems (LSDS), Imperial College London.

Before his Master’s, Mustapha obtained a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering from Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria. His interests span Machine Learning, Reinforcement Learning, and Robotics.
:::
